Introduction

Hana, also known as Jiwon and formerly known as Sunn and Viva, is a South Korean rapper and dancer. She is a member of the dance crew SOONIGROUP and a former member of the girl groups GOOD DAY, cignature, and ALDL.

She was a contestant on The Unit.

J9 Entertainment:
Jan 14, 2020-Apr 27, 2021
